code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./TopDoctors.css';import Title from'../title/Title';import Doctor from'../doctor/Doctor';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Context}from'../../context/Context';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TopDoctors=()=>{const{doctors}=useContext(Context);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-doctors py-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"Top Doctors to Book",paragraph:"Simply browse through our extensive list of trusted doctors."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"doctors-container",children:doctors.map(doctor=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doctor,{id:doctor._id,image:`http://localhost:4000/images/${doctor.image}`,name:doctor.name,speciality:doctor.speciality},doctor._id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/doctors",className:"px-5 py-2 more",children:"more"})]});};export default TopDoctors;
